title: Why John Wick Almost Went Straight to DVD/Blu-Ray
description:
This video is sponsored by Brilliant. Go to https://brilliant.org/Midnight/ and sign up for free 30 day trial, the first 200 people that go to that link will get 20% off the annual Premium subscription.
John Wick Chapter 4 was just released, so it felt like the right time to go back to 2014 and look at the production of the very first film.  In this video, I go over the strange production history of Keanu Reeves' biggest comeback.
Keanu career video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gbEtnljUGyE&t=15s&ab_channel=captainmidnight
Music by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/midnightcap
